title: Siamfc++: Towards robust and accurate visual tracking with target estimation guidelines
venue: Proceedings of the AAAI conference on artificial intelligence
excerpt: This paper draws guidelines for visual tracking from comprehensive analysis and proposes an anchor-free tracker.
citation: Xu, Yinda, et al. "Siamfc++: Towards robust and accurate visual tracking with target estimation guidelines." Proceedings of the AAAI conference on artificial intelligence. Vol. 34. No. 07. 2020.

title: DRL-Based Trajectory Tracking for Motion-Related Modules in Autonomous Driving
excerpt: This paper addresses trajectory tracking problem via Deep Reinforcement Learning.
citation: Xu, Yinda, and Lidong Yu. "DRL-Based Trajectory Tracking for Motion-Related Modules in Autonomous Driving." arXiv preprint arXiv:2308.15991 (2023).
